appSubtitle: Create stunning, photorealistic mockups in seconds.
step2Subtitle: Generate a few base scenes and pick your favorite.
step3Subtitle: This image will be placed into the {{designType}}.
tiltShiftDescription: Creates a miniature, toy-like appearance by blurring the background and foreground.
mockupPlaceholderTitle: Your generated mockup will appear here.
errorInvalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.
errorFileSizeTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 15MB.
styleNoneDescription: No artistic style will be applied.
styleCinematicDescription: Adds a movie-like, high-contrast color grade.
styleVintageDescription: Gives the mockup a nostalgic, 1970s photo look.
styleWatercolorDescription: Transforms the image into a soft, painterly style.
styleNoirDescription: High-contrast black and white with dramatic shadows.
stylePopArtDescription: Vibrant, comic-book style with bold colors and outlines.
styleImpressionismDescription: Soft, painterly style with visible brushstrokes, focusing on light.
highQualityModeDescription: Generates a more detailed image. May take longer.
backgroundBlurEffectDescription: Adds a subtle background blur (bokeh) to make the subject pop.
